item.description:
Hi, I’m Pelanyo!

I’m a Computer Science student at Swansea University and an intern at Microsoft London.

What is this?

This is a collection of random thoughts and ideas primarily related to technology and engineering but can easily go off on more wild tangents

Can I contact you?

Of course, feel free to email me at pkamara@disroot.org about anything!
